channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiDDoS-F
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiDDoS-F

item.title: CVE-2023-25603|2024-08-30T18:07:23.910Z -- fortinet -- fortiddos-f
item.description: A permissive cross-domain policy with untrusted domains vulnerability in Fortinet FortiADC 7.1.0 - 7.1.1, FortiDDoS-F 6.3.0 - 6.3.4 and 6.4.0 - 6.4.1 allow an unauthorized attacker to carry out privileged actions and retrieve sensitive information via crafted web requests.

item.title: CVE-2023-29177|2024-08-30T18:09:33.400Z -- fortinet -- fortiddos-f
item.description: Multiple buffer copy without checking size of input ('classic buffer overflow') vulnerabilities [CWE-120] in FortiADC version 7.2.0 and before 7.1.2 & FortiDDoS-F version 6.5.0 and before 6.4.1 allows a privileged attacker to execute arbitrary code or commands via specifically crafted CLI requests.
